events.message: We have received the application from the candidate applying for the senior software engineer position.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department for further processing and review.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening to assess the candidate’s technical skills and experience fit.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team on May 10th.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and benefits with the candidate next week.
The candidate completed the HR interview positively, showing alignment with the company’s values and policies.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate following all successful interviews and evaluations.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the team.
The candidate accepted the job offer officially and confirmed their start date for next month.
The onboarding process has started with orientation and training scheduled for the new software engineer.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed for the engineering position with the candidate fully onboarded.
